casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Sidney C. Brown, C. M. Pearson, and H. O. Plasman, Appellants, v. J. GORDON, Appellee.* No. 6236. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 14, 1932. W. P. Hughes, U. S. Atty., of Jacksonville, Fla., for appellants.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIB-LEY, Circuit Judges.

Rehearing granted June 9, 1932.

 PER CURIAM.

On the authority of Commercial Credit Co. v. United States (C. C. A.) 53 F.(2d) 977, and decisions of the Supreme Court there cited, the judgment herein is affirmed.
